Posts.Content: Kiki1970 wrote: Hi! I have a strong familial history of breast CA (both grandmothers, all aunts, mother, and 2 sisters - Mom & sister deceased). I have been having various symptoms as well. I am having my first mammogram this week, followed by bloodwork and genetic testing. What are everyone's thoughts on prophylactic treatment...mastectomy and medication? Just trying to get my ducks in a row. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just getting started...strong family history Kiki1970 Gavinsmom5
